``` {r}

df.adj <- read_csv('../data/pilot-adj-endorsement-1/pilot-adj-endorsement-1-trials-tidy.csv')
glimpse(df.adj)

# substitute the superordinates
df.adj.w.mode <- df.adj %>% mutate(superordinate = ifelse(item == "jockey", "people", superordinate ),
                                   superordinate = ifelse(item == "plastic", "decorations", superordinate ),
                                   superordinate = ifelse(item == "walker", "people", superordinate ),
                                   superordinate = ifelse(item == "downtown street", "roads", superordinate ),
                                   superordinate = ifelse(item == "dusk", "days", superordinate ),
                                   )

write_csv(df.adj.w.mode, '../data/pilot-adj-endorsement-1/pilot-adj-endorsement-1-modal-super.csv')
```
